text: there's no problems if you're happily in
love with the right person the problems
come when you are rejected in love
people stalk they slip into clinical
depression they commit suicide or
homicide romantic love has a
constellation of personality traits of
characteristics and among them is a
trait called separation anxiety and
that's been well known for some time
when you're separated from the person
you get anxious you want them to text
you want them to write you want them to
call you want them to tell you that they
love you so I decided it would be much
more important for me to put people who
were just been rejected in love into the
brain scanner my hypothesis was that
brain regions linked with profound
addiction would become activated one was
a brain region linked with basic
feelings of deep romantic love you know
you don't stop loving somebody just
because they dumped you in fact you can
love them more
I call it frustration attraction when
you can't get what you want you just try
harder also a brain region linked with a
feelings of attachment to this person so
romantic love and attachment three brain
regions became active linked with
craving and addiction including the
primary brain factory that becomes
active when you take cocaine and you're
going through withdrawals and last but
not least we found activity in a brain
region linked with physical pain not
only physical pain but the anxiety that
goes along with physical pain so what a
bad deal you get dumped you still madly
in love with the person deeply attached
to the person craving the person
obsessively thinking about the person
the person has become an addiction for
you and you're in physical and an
emotional pain
